name: VersionNuspec
description: Applies a version to a Nuspec manifest based on the build number. Based on Microsoft sample from https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/vs/alm/Build/overview
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for NuSpec files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extraced from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' or provided as a complete version number e.g. 1.1.1.1

inputs.name: InjectVersion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True no regex processing will be done to the build number.

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter build number from name.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
